column4: anyone in here use kdenlive?  for some reason its not compiling anything...just sitting there
ohhh  yeah. What are you rendering it to? H.264?
on my i7 2600k clocked up to 5GHz a 2 hour movie can take 1.5hours
lol what kind of computer you using?
try using a profile with x264.
I made a video on youtube how to compile and use ffmpeg. Also wrote a script to do all the work
a bit old but might help you out. I am making a new video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0IDV6r-bCI
what kind of cpu you have?
that shouldn't matter...as it was working perfectly fine a few weeks ago
it shows waiting for like 2 or 3 minutes..then it starts to render
how big is the org file? might be huge and you might have slow drives
serisolly though kdenlive is the best video editing program on *nix.

that video I put up on YT can play at 1080p and does not even need flash to watch it. A HTML5 browser that is.
